DOC.brief_summary: This study design test whether treatment kudzu extract increase rate alcohol enters brain measure rapid proton magnetic resonance spectroscopy ( 1H-MRS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Kudzu Effects Brain Ethanol Levels : Proton Spectroscopy Assessment
DOC.criteria: Capable understand comply protocol Good physical mental health ( normal physical exam , ECG , blood urine chemistry , psychopathology ) Body Mass Index 1830 , inclusive Age 2140 year Moderate alcohol drinker ( less 20 drinks/week ) Have stable living situation current postal address No contraindication MR scanning ( see MR scan exclusion criterion ) Concurrent diagnosis Axis I disorder Current past alcohol dependence ; may meet criterion alcohol abuse . Other drug dependence acceptable great 3 year . Current drug abuse ( alcohol marijuana abuse ) . Past drug abuse acceptable . Subjects actively seek treatment drug alcohol dependence . Subjects use marijuana week . Marijuana abuse/dependence acceptable use criterion meet . Maintained antipsychotic antidepressant medication ; take prescription medication except certain shortterm anti fungal agent tropical cream dermal condition . Tobacco use great 10 cigarette per day History major head trauma result cognitive impairment history seizure disorder Heavy caffeine use ( great 500 mg regular , daily basis ) For female volunteer , positive pregnancy test
